text: phir jab hamane usake lie maut ka faisala laagoo kiya to phir un jinnon ko usakee maut ka pata bas bhoomi ke us keede ne diya jo usakee laathee ko kha raha tha. phir jab vah gir pada, tab jinnon par prakat hua ki yadi ve paroksh ke jaananevaale hote to is apamaanajanak yaatana mein pade na rahate
